questions.question_text: Which platform feature can be used to determine the relationships between field in an Import Set table to field in an existing ServiceNow table?
questions.answer_description:
A transform map determines the relationships between fields displaying in an Import Set table and fields in an existing ServiceNow table, such as the Incidents or
Users table.
Reference:
https://community.servicenow.com/community?id=community_question&sys_id=69fc8369db9cdbc01dcaf3231f961935

discussion.content: C, Transform MAP

Selected Answer: C
Transform map is correct
C. Transform Map - correct

questions.question_text: When configuring a REST Message, the Endpoint is:

choices.D: The response from the provider indicating there is no data to send back
choices.C: Information about the format of the returned data
choices.A: The commands to the REST script to stop execution
choices.B: The URI of the data to be accessed, queried, or modified

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct base on Lab 9.2 number 5 (page 455 of SN CAD ebook)

Selected Answer: B
The endpoint is the URL of the data to be retrieved, updated, or deleted.
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-api-reference/page/integrate/outbound-rest/reference/r_RESTMessageElements.html

choices.C: From the most specific match to the most generic match
choices.D: From the most generic match to the most specific match
choices.A: Only for matches on the current table
choices.B: Only for matches on the current field

questions.question_text: When evaluating Access Controls, ServiceNow searches and evaluates:

discussion.content:
Correct is C.
https://developer.servicenow.com/dev.do#!/learn/learning-plans/paris/new_to_servicenow/app_store_learnv2_securingapps_paris_access_controls_evaluation_order
Answer :C

Selected Answer: C
Whenever a session requests data, the system searches for access control rules that match the requested object and operation. If there is a matching access control rule, then the system evaluates if the user has the permissions required to access the object and operation. If an access control rule specifies more than one permission, then the user must meet all permissions to gain access to the object and operation. Failing any one permission check prevents the user from accessing the matching object and operation.
If a user does not meet the permissions of the first matching rule, the system evaluates the permissions of the next matching access control rule as specified by the access control processing order. If the user fails to meet the permissions of any matching access control rule, the system denies access to the requested object and operation.

Selected Answer: C
correct is C

Selected Answer: C
Answer: C

Selected Answer: C
https://developer.servicenow.com/dev.do#!/learn/learning-plans/tokyo/new_to_servicenow/app_store_learnv2_securingapps_tokyo_access_controls_evaluation_order

Selected Answer: C
It's C:
When deciding whether to grant or deny access, the ACL is searched from the most specific to the most generic match.
Correct is C.
Correct answer is C

questions.question_text: In a Business Rule, which one of the following returns true if the currently logged in user has the admin role?

choices.A: Enter the name of the Application in the Global search field
choices.B: Open the list of Update Sets for the instance
choices.C: Examine the Application Files Related List in the application to be published
choices.D: Open the artifact records individually to verify the value in the Application field

questions.question_text: To see what scripts, reports, and other application artifacts will be in a published application:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
this is correct

Selected Answer: C
correct answer is C

Selected Answer: B
The correct answer is B because the question states that the application has been published. Answer C is not correct because it states the application 'is to be published' ie. It has not yet been published

Selected Answer: C
Question correct

Selected Answer: C
"Application developers can view the complete list of application files from the custom application record."

Selected Answer: C
Answer C

Copied from the provided link, "Update sets work in scoped apps just like they do in global scope. But there is a better way to move scoped apps from one instance to another. This capability is called "publish" and it allows you to move an application just like you would with a single executable. The publish capability checks for dependencies and locks the application in the instance where it has been moved so that no changes can be made". for option B
